title: Ep. - 311 - DOCUMENTARY FILMMAKERS JULES AND GEDEON NAUDET 9/11 AND NOVEMBER 13: ATTACK ON PARIS
description:
Filmmakers Jules and Gedeon Naudet talk about two of their most notable films about terrorist attacks. Their documentary 9/11 is a 2002 documentary film about the September 11 attacks in New York City, in which two planes were flown into the buildings of the World Trade Center, resulting in their destruction and the deaths of more than 2,000 people. Jules Naudet taped one of only three known recordings of the first plane hitting the North Tower (Tower 1) of the World Trade Center in the 9/11 attacks. The video camera that Jules was using that captured Flight 11 crashing into the World Trade Center is now on display in the National Museum of American History in Washington D.C.[2]

In June 2018, they released November 13 Attack on Paris on Netflix, a documentary featuring interviews about the November 2015 terrorist attacks in Paris.

 

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey
